relation: Has a 30% chance of making the target flinch.
Does double damage to opponents with a status ailment.
Has a 30% chance of paralyzing the opponent.
Inflicts damage matching the user's level.
Has a 10% chance of raising all the user's stats by one level.
Has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Special Defense.
Has a high critical hit ratio.
The user disappears on the first turn, strikes on the second turn. Hits through Protect.
